mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.user_name as userName, u.photo as photo, u.profile as profile, r.id as userRelationId FROM user_relation as r left join user_info as u on r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.follow_user_id = #{followUserId} and r.follow_stat = ${@cor.chrissy.community.common.enums.FollowStateEnum@FOLLOW.code} ORDER BY u.id desc
